mapper.select: SELECT idx.index_name AS name , CASE WHEN idx.index_name = 'PRIMARY' THEN idx.index_name WHEN idx.non_unique = 0 THEN 'UNIQUE' ELSE 'PERFORMANCE' END AS category , col.column_name AS column_name FROM information_schema.STATISTICS idx INNER JOIN information_schema.columns col ON idx.table_schema = col.table_schema AND idx.table_name = col.table_name AND idx.column_name = col.column_name WHERE idx.table_schema = #{schemaName} AND idx.table_name = #{tableName} ORDER BY col.ordinal_position , idx.seq_in_index
